Configurations API documentation version v1

http://github.com/sling-incubator/lsp-apis

Configuration API updating system wide configurations

This documents the API calls that can be made to update configurations in the system

/configurations

/configurations/tables get post

  • Retrieve configurations for all modules associated with a specific institution.
  • Add a module to the configuration tables

The JWT token limits the returned configurations to those of the calling institution

get

Retrieve a list of table items.

post

Create a new table item.

get /configurations/tables

Retrieve a list of table items.

  • Request
  • Response

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Query Parameters

  • offset: (integer - maximum: 1000)

    Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query

  • limit: (integer - default: 10 - maximum: 100)

    Limit the number of elements returned in the response

    Example:

    10
  • orderBy: (string)

    Order by field: module

  • order: (one of desc, asc - default: desc)

    Order

  • query: (string)

    JSON array [{"field1","value1","operator1"},{"field2","value2","operator2"},...,{"fieldN","valueN","operatorN"}] with valid searchable fields: for example module = CIRCULATION

    Example:

    ["module", "CIRCULATION", "="]

HTTP status code 200

Returns a list of table items

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "config_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "module": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "name": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "description": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "updated_by": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "update_date": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "scope": {
            "type" : "object",
            "properties": {
              "institution_id": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "library_id": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "row": {
            "type": "array",
            "items": [
              {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "code": {
                    "type": "string"
                  },
                  "description": {
                    "type": "string"
                  },
                  "default": {
                    "type": "boolean"
                  },
                  "enabled": {
                    "type": "boolean"
                  },
                  "value": {
                    "type": "integer"
                  }
                }
              }
            ]
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "module",
          "name",
          "description",
          "institution_id",
          "library_id"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "config_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "config_data": [
    {
      "module": "CIRCULATION",
      "name": "renewals_allowed_count",
      "description": "Limit the number of times a single item can be renewed",
      "updated_by": "joe",
      "update_date": "yyyy.mm.dd.hh.mm.ss",
      "institution_id": "aaa",
      "library_id": "vvv",
      "row": [
        {
          "code": "UNDERGRAD",
          "description": "for undergrads",
          "default": true,
          "enabled": true,
          "value": 3
        },
        {
          "code": "STAFF",
          "description": "for staff",
          "default": false,
          "enabled": true,
          "value": 6
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

unable to list tables -- malformed parameter 'query', syntax error at column 6

HTTP status code 401

No valid token found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 403

Access denied not valid privilage in resurces

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 500

Internal server error, e.g due to misconfiguration

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

internal server error, contact administrator

post /configurations/tables

Create a new table item.

  • Request
  • Response

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "config_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "module": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "name": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "description": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "updated_by": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "update_date": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "scope": {
            "type" : "object",
            "properties": {
              "institution_id": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "library_id": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "row": {
            "type": "array",
            "items": [
              {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "code": {
                    "type": "string"
                  },
                  "description": {
                    "type": "string"
                  },
                  "default": {
                    "type": "boolean"
                  },
                  "enabled": {
                    "type": "boolean"
                  },
                  "value": {
                    "type": "integer"
                  }
                }
              }
            ]
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "module",
          "name",
          "description",
          "institution_id",
          "library_id"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "config_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "config_data": [
    {
      "module": "CIRCULATION",
      "name": "renewals_allowed_count",
      "description": "Limit the number of times a single item can be renewed",
      "institution_id": "aaa",
      "library_id": "vvv"
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 201

Returns a newly created item, with server-controlled fields like 'id' populated

Headers

  • Location: (string)

    URI to the created table item

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "config_data": [
    {
      "module": "CIRCULATION",
      "name": "renewals_allowed_count",
      "description": "Limit the number of times a single item can be renewed",
      "updated_by": "joe",
      "update_date": "yyyy.mm.dd.hh.mm.ss",
      "institution_id": "aaa",
      "library_id": "vvv",
      "row": [
        {
          "code": "UNDERGRAD",
          "description": "for undergrads",
          "default": true,
          "enabled": true,
          "value": 3
        },
        {
          "code": "STAFF",
          "description": "for staff",
          "default": false,
          "enabled": true,
          "value": 6
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

"unable to add table -- malformed JSON at 13:3"

HTTP status code 401

No valid token found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 403

Access denied not valid privilage in resurces

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 500

Internal server error, e.g. due to misconfiguration

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Internal server error, contact administrator

/configurations/tables/{tableId} get delete put

  • Delete or Update a specific module from the configuration table
    An example of this would be to add a configuration to the circulation table or to delete a configuration from the circulation table. The query parameters can be used to filter for the desired module's configuration
  • Get a the specified module's configurations

The JWT token limits the returned configurations to those of the calling institution

get

Retrieve table item with given {tableId}

delete

Delete table item with given {tableId}

put

Update table item with given {tableId}

get /configurations/tables/{tableId}

Retrieve table item with given {tableId}

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • tableId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Query Parameters

  • offset: (integer - maximum: 1000)

    Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query

  • limit: (integer - default: 10 - maximum: 100)

    Limit the number of elements returned in the response

    Example:

    10
  • orderBy: (string)

    Order by field: module

  • order: (one of desc, asc - default: desc)

    Order

  • query: (string)

    JSON array [{"field1","value1","operator1"},{"field2","value2","operator2"},...,{"fieldN","valueN","operatorN"}] with valid searchable fields: for example name = renewals_allowed_count

    Example:

    ["name", "renewals_allowed_count", "="]

HTTP status code 200

Returns item with a given ID

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "config_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "module": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "name": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "description": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "updated_by": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "update_date": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "scope": {
            "type" : "object",
            "properties": {
              "institution_id": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "library_id": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "row": {
            "type": "array",
            "items": [
              {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "code": {
                    "type": "string"
                  },
                  "description": {
                    "type": "string"
                  },
                  "default": {
                    "type": "boolean"
                  },
                  "enabled": {
                    "type": "boolean"
                  },
                  "value": {
                    "type": "integer"
                  }
                }
              }
            ]
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "module",
          "name",
          "description",
          "institution_id",
          "library_id"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "config_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "config_data": [
    {
      "module": "CIRCULATION",
      "name": "renewals_allowed_count",
      "description": "Limit the number of times a single item can be renewed",
      "updated_by": "joe",
      "update_date": "yyyy.mm.dd.hh.mm.ss",
      "institution_id": "aaa",
      "library_id": "vvv",
      "row": [
        {
          "code": "UNDERGRAD",
          "description": "for undergrads",
          "default": true,
          "enabled": true,
          "value": 3
        },
        {
          "code": "STAFF",
          "description": "for staff",
          "default": false,
          "enabled": true,
          "value": 6
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 401

No valid token found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 403

Access denied not valid privilage in resurces

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 404

Item with a given ID not found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

"table not found"

HTTP status code 500

Internal server error, e.g. due to misconfiguration

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

internal server error, contact administrator

delete /configurations/tables/{tableId}

Delete table item with given {tableId}

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • tableId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

HTTP status code 204

Item deleted successfully

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

"unable to delete table -- constraint violation"

HTTP status code 401

No valid token found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

HTTP status code 403

Body

Example:

Internal server error, e.g. due to misconfiguration

Body

Example:

put /configurations/tables/{tableId}

Update table item with given {tableId}

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • tableId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "config_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "module": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "name": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "description": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "updated_by": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "update_date": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "scope": {
            "type" : "object",
            "properties": {
              "institution_id": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "library_id": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "row": {
            "type": "array",
            "items": [
              {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                  "code": {
                    "type": "string"
                  },
                  "description": {
                    "type": "string"
                  },
                  "default": {
                    "type": "boolean"
                  },
                  "enabled": {
                    "type": "boolean"
                  },
                  "value": {
                    "type": "integer"
                  }
                }
              }
            ]
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "module",
          "name",
          "description",
          "institution_id",
          "library_id"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "config_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "config_data": [
    {
      "module": "CIRCULATION",
      "name": "renewals_allowed_count",
      "description": "Limit the number of times a single item can be renewed",
      "updated_by": "joe",
      "update_date": "yyyy.mm.dd.hh.mm.ss",
      "institution_id": "aaa",
      "library_id": "vvv",
      "row": [
        {
          "code": "UNDERGRAD",
          "description": "for undergrads",
          "default": true,
          "enabled": true,
          "value": 3
        },
        {
          "code": "STAFF",
          "description": "for staff",
          "default": false,
          "enabled": true,
          "value": 6
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 204

Item successfully updated

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

"unable to update table -- malformed JSON at 13:4"
